lenders.name: hannah
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give money to those in need.

lenders.name: Bea
lenders.loan_because: by giving, I gain more than I lend!

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I've been very, very fortunate and not needed a lot of assistance. Others are not so fortunate so I need to help when and where possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the computers and network for a School of Pharmacy at a state University.

lenders.name: ibanezplayer
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneurial spirit that lives within people. If everyone who had an idea for a business, had the guts to dive in, and had the self-motivation to make it happen was given access to the funds he/she needed, we could eliminate poverty. Poverty sucks. That's why I lend.
lenders.occupational_info: Plan, implement, control, repeat.

lenders.loan_because: If I cannot give, I shall refuse to receive.
lenders.occupational_info: Math/Science Teacher

lenders.name: Olivier

lenders.name: Dee

lenders.occupational_info: I work and live in the beautiful Teton Valley and I work at a store that carries carved wood furniture and antiques.

lenders.name: Christine

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a building company 3 days a week in the Office doing general office duties. My daughter Hayley is in Year 11 school and hopes to be a Teacher in the future

lenders.loan_because: I really wanted to change my childrens future..I am applying for this loan to start a new business which i know this would change our way of living and not just contented with what i am now. I wanted start a new life.. A new life together with my children.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working in a very hazardous area...I am dealing chemicals..

lenders.name: Jeffry
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microloans help the person who receives the loan and the person giving the loan. It brings them together, even if only through the microloan system, and makes the world smaller and friendlier.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who helps people protect their jobs or homes. Some of my clients are from other countries and are new to the United States. Others are ill or poor or with little education. I am called a "civil rights lawyer."

lenders.loan_because: i had experienced being in poverty myself. I just want someone to have the opportunity to succeed.

lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves the chance to be the best they can be

lenders.name: Mazzy
lenders.loan_because: Western countries hold so much of the worlds wealth to the point where it is unfair.  I loan to Kiva as I am able to make a real difference in someones life, without making them dependent on aid.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a strong advocate for social justice and believe people working together to support each other is where the real change comes.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: I can!!

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because:
For as little as $25, I can make a Real Difference! To make a $25 loan all I have to do is skip one lunch with one friend - to me it's lunch, to someone else it can make all the difference.

I like the sustainability inherent in this loan program. I like the ease and security of using PayPal. I like the fact that the recipients get ALL of the money you loan, not a %. I like the fact that this is a loan, not a hand out.

I never donated to "Feed the Children" despite the pitiful pleading ads. The administrative cost for that program is very high, and I always felt that if I had to feed Sally Struthers first, there would be little if anything left over for the children.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a small architectural firm in downtown Cleveland, Ohio USA. I come from a 4th generation local family printing company and celebrate the  'mini-entrepreneur' spirit.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: To help those with ambition get ahead.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of providing opportunity to someone who statistically may not qualify for a bank loan but desires entrepreneurial freedom.  I lend because everybody deserves the chance to nurture their own business model, and to personally enjoy the financial stability and personal dignity that stem from their achievements.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently, I am a graduate student at The American University of Paris & L'Institut Catholique de Paris.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help fulfill dreams and aspirations

lenders.name: Loani

lenders.name: Jim

lenders.name: Frank

lenders.name: Kat
lenders.loan_because: I wouldn't be who I am without the help of others.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because:
I know the impact starting a small business can have, not only on the owner of the new business, but their family, their employees and their community. 

This is the truest purpose of money....investing in others to help them grow and enrich their lives so they can in turn help others.
lenders.occupational_info:
We promote home ownership. We help people learn about the process of buying and selling real estate. We then help them look for a home to buy or do the marketing necessary to help them sell their home.

My wife and I are starting our 4th bee season. I'm interested in helping others who may also have an interest in beekeeping. Beekeeping for us is a hobby, though in some parts of the world the income generated from honey sales can change your life style. I would like to find ways to reach out to potential beekeepers who would like to create new income and opportunities for their families through beekeeping. Kiva seems to be a good outlet for this ambition.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I feel that the best way that people can make a difference in others lives is by giving them the opportunity to help themselves!!

lenders.name: sunday
lenders.loan_because: i will want my poutry farm to come to standard, as i still need to inprove on it
lenders.occupational_info: i have been into this poutry farm for the past two year,and there is a lot of improvement to in the last few year,just that i need some loan to be able to bring it to a standard that i need by incresing the number of  chuckens so as the meet the demand of the public in egg production.

lenders.name: Eirik
lenders.loan_because: It's a small price to pay to sleep better at night. Time to boost my karma...
lenders.occupational_info: I make people pay back what they owe to the society in a way that works for everybody...

lenders.name: Linn Merete
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people in a meaningful way, rather than to give money to a huge, faceless organisation who spends a vast amount of money on administration.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach junior high kids, full time.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people to help themselves. God bless them!
lenders.occupational_info: We manufacture inflatable 'wavy men' for advertising and promotional purposes.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.occupation: retired but still teach part time at community col

lenders.name: Rhys
lenders.occupation: Stay at Home Mum of Three
lenders.loan_because: I am a mum of three beautiful healthy children who are well provided for (food, shelter, clothed, loved), and by doing this I can also help another family provide a bit more security, stability, food, and shelter for their children.  I hope as small as it is that this loan can fullfill a dream and inspire another.
lenders.occupational_info: Twins almost 2 years and our "surprise" baby (born 25/7/07) is extremely tiring, never-ending 24 hour job of changing nappies, bathing, feeding, breaking up fights, huge tantrums & housework but rewarded with hugs & kisses & laughter - wouldn't change a thing!

lenders.name: ernest
lenders.occupation: a biochemistry graduate and a graduate in computer

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: others helped me when I needed it.

lenders.name: mattb
lenders.loan_because: why not?

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: Because by the grace of God we can.And to keep the grace of God we should.
lenders.occupational_info: A god send

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.occupational_info: I split my time between working at home raising our three children with my beautiful wife, Miranda, and working at a charter airline training flight attendants.

lenders.name: Patricia/Bill/Grandkids
lenders.loan_because: A privilege and a duty to help.  I want my grandkids to know the joy of giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I work part-time at home editing of academic reports and other written materials.

lenders.name: Piero
lenders.loan_because: I realize that some small amount of money (for me) can have a large impact somewhere else.
lenders.occupational_info: I sit in an office and watch a computer all day, it's not exciting.  This is one way of reaching out and connecting to other humans in the world.

lenders.name: otto flux
lenders.loan_because: i can, and should.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: to make our planet a little little bit better.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: a little goes a long way

lenders.name: Aviv & Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We want to assist others enjoy life
lenders.occupational_info: We work in the software market and build our family

lenders.name: Harry
lenders.loan_because: It isn't hard to find $25 to help someone create a life for themselves.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the community helping people. Our lives, although distant, are inter-related.

lenders.name: Brandon
lenders.loan_because: I'm very fortunate to be able to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second Language to international students in Canada.

lenders.name: Shane
lenders.loan_because: of how something thats percieved as such a small amount in the US can do so much more to improve a life in another part of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a technology company that provides services to large commercial companies.  I grew up on a farm so I do have a interest in the agricultural world.

lenders.name: James C.
lenders.loan_because: Giving is... and Feels AMAZING! ...So YOU feel Good... they feel Good ...and every day the Sun gets to shine just a little bit brighter! Aaaaah nothing like win/ win/ win/ win/ Win!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I love life and people, and i make short and long movies about them. Also when people are down i help pick them up again! ;)

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. It isn't a hand out, it is a way out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 11-13 year olds about the world.

lenders.name: Maria & John
lenders.loan_because: we needed loans to get on our feet, too.

lenders.name: Sascha
lenders.loan_because: Shopping for something really impactful, direct and lasting in lieu of simple donations to ‘mainstream’ charities, I found KIVA, a clever fusion of microfunding and good people using advanced IT.  With consistently good feedback from all stakeholders, I trust these guys and keep on lending regularly since Oct 2007.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the European Union, helping that people fly safely.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to speak English.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to need help.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: it's a way to impact the world at the grassroots level. People need hope, and financial support is one way to cultivate hope.

lenders.name: Mark Whittington
lenders.loan_because: I just saw the paradigm shift, and  realized it's potential...I mean, look what the profit motive has gotten us.
lenders.occupational_info: i have just begun buying in the Middle East, to sell in the U.S.- and researching what to bring back from there to sell here.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I help people find things.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have been in need before, and people who are able to help are a godsend.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in Marketing and Sales, and own my own business.  This is an amazing gift to business owners across the globe, and I look forward to continuing to

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who are less fortunate than me.

lenders.name: Janet & Albert
lenders.loan_because: I believe education will be the key to a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a regional accountant for a public corporation

lenders.name: Nate & Tracie
lenders.loan_because: We can impact the world in a positive way by helping people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Owners of a personal training studio.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.occupational_info: I am a civil engineer.  I have worked on port and harbour projects in many parts of the world including Central and South America, North Africa and Indonesia.  I now look after the buildings that house the lifeboats around the coasts of the UK and Ireland.

lenders.name: Basil
lenders.loan_because: I need to set up a stationery bookshop and a photocopying machine to help community schools and institutions around.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a tutor or a teacher trainer

lenders.name: Spencer Paul
lenders.occupational_info: Student at Brigham Young University.

lenders.name: Mike Tracey Nathan & Tim
lenders.loan_because: Microcredit can change lives! What a privilege to be able to assist people in a way that preserves their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: Mike helps ensure that aircraft purchased by the Australian military are safe and can do the job. Tracey buys and manages real estate, and takes primary responsibility for home duties and child rearing.

lenders.name: Andy (& Macha)
lenders.loan_because: I come from a poor family and I know what is the value of the money when you need it. Vengo de una familia pobre, y se cual es el valor del dinero cuando lo necesita.

lenders.name: Cory
lenders.loan_because: I want to help motivated entrepreneurs succeed
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that answers complex strategic and operational questions for large corporations

lenders.name: Tawny
lenders.occupational_info: A couple friends and I make glass jewelry - we focus sunlight using a large magnifying lens to melt the glass.

lenders.name: Tom & Michelle
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we can, and because we can, we believe we should.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students reading and writing and Michelle works helping adults who are handicapped.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to Kazakhstan and seen the potential of the people there.  The economic situation in the rest of Central Asia is not as optimistic as in Kazakhstan but the desires of the people are great.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a preschool teacher, wife, and most importantly mother.  In my "previous life" I was a nurse in pediatrics and nursery/NICU.

lenders.name: The Rowleys
lenders.occupation: Gas Utility Tech, Computer tech, 2 students.
lenders.loan_because: We think that anyone willing to work hard deserves the chance to improve their and their family's life. We have so much that is good and think that this is a good way to share effectively. This is how the children have agreed to spend their Christmas money this year.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a natural gas service tech.(provincial gas utility) and my wife Lynette is an information tech. (computers) with the district health region. Spencer is in grade 3. Grady is in grade 7.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.occupational_info: I sell home security systems to home owners to keep their home and family safe.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I have so much to be thankful for I want to share my good fortune with other women. As a single woman raising 2 children I know times can get hard.My hpoe is to help others to be successful and give them encouragement.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in microcredit and microenterprise development.

I am also a Return Peace Corps Volunteer (Burkina Faso 1984-1986) and saw first hand how strong and capable African women are.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: it's good to spread the wealth

lenders.name: Alisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people fund their entrepreneurial dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a trivia business in pubs.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others - simple as that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a married father of one son. I am very grateful for the blessings that God has given me and my family .  I pray for the help of God for my Kiva brothers and sisters.

lenders.name: Xan
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic opportunity to reach out and help those who are working hard to improve their lives.  I'm so grateful for all that my family has and this is such a simple way to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I support the sales and marketing departments computer systems.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I've built my own business and I know it takes money to make money.  This is a perfect way to help other hard-working  folks to be sucessful.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a company that manufactures and sell a stall treat for horses

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: As a teacher, I help young men & women understand the wonders of biology.  As a woodworker, I create art from wood.

lenders.name: C & M
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance makes a lot of sense.
lenders.occupational_info: We work with computer systems in various ways.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I think this is such an awesome and practical idea! Many hands make light work. Kudos to the founders!
lenders.occupational_info: Insurance

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I live in such luxury because I was born in a rich country, no other reason. The rest of the world deserves a taste of a better life, especially if all they need is simply working capital to obtain their goals

lenders.name: Leanne, Taz and Dex
lenders.loan_because: we all seek comfort, prosperity and security.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: Our late son Greg was aciively trying to aid those in developing countries.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy for us to do this together.
lenders.occupational_info: washing dishes

lenders.name: Roberta
lenders.loan_because: I want to demonstrate to my grandchildren that each of us can make a difference - that we're all connected.
lenders.occupational_info: A mother of four and grandmother of three, I write articles about health and women's issues for magazines and newspapers.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Pay back for comfortable life. Help people in need.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I understand what it is like to have a great idea or product and no money to support that idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have a severe and persistent mental illness. I help them learn coping strategies to increase their knowledge and strength in themselves.

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others that aren't as fortunate as we are here in the U.S.

lenders.name: Kylie & Toby
lenders.loan_because: Everyone in this world has a right to have everything they want and need, to be happy and healthy not just the rich
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a stay at home mum of 3 young boys, work part time cleaning houses, my husband works as GMH a car manufacturing plant as a store man and fork truck driver. We make an average earnings but I wish I had more money so I could help other people.
THE WORLD IS NOTHING WITHOUT THE PEOPLE IN IT, AND WITHOUT THEM THERE IS NO POINT TO HAVING A WORLD

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I hope it can bring "happiness" to someones life... if the world can come together to "give more" then we all would be in a happier place.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because:
It is less than I spend on a nice dinnner. Think about that.
The needs of people around the world are less than a minor night out for me. Are things askew, or what.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Encouraging self-sustainability and economic independence is an important part of my Left-Libertarian activism. For more about Left-Libertarianism see: http://mutualist.blogspot.com/ , http://www.bradspangler.com/blog/ , and http://groups.yahoo.com/group/LeftLibertarian2/

lenders.name: West
lenders.loan_because: I love to help
lenders.occupational_info: Actor

lenders.name: kisty
lenders.loan_because: My life has been blessed so I'm simply paying it forward!

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to know that a small loan can make such a big difference
lenders.occupational_info: I talk to the press about a large software company

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I am thankful for all life has given me and hope to help enrich the lives of others.

lenders.name: Cat
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the computing envorinment for a technical and scientific community of users.

lenders.name: DennisKeller
lenders.loan_because: It's important.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: In the end what matters most is not what we have, but rather what we have shared.

lenders.name: Lonna
lenders.loan_because:
It's wonderful to be able to give an amount I can
afford that can make such a significant difference 
in someone else's life, and to be a part of such 
a huge, wonderful, worldwide community.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am responsible for the business side of a
computer repair company, which includes
everything but the actual repair/technical side.

lenders.name: Roweth Family
lenders.loan_because: Love the way that this is a hand up and not a hand out and we can keep on helping family after family and in doing so help a whole community.

lenders.name: maddie & sophie
lenders.loan_because: Our family believe this is a wonderful project and we are so lucky that we felt we needed to share some of our good fortune.
lenders.occupational_info: This is a gift from us to you. Reap the benefits.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I like the stories and admire people that are trying to make a better life for themselves.  Its a great feeling to be able to help in some way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a child care assistant and carer of my adult brother.  I have 4  children. Recently completed child care certificate. Also studying property investment so I can make a better life for my family and help others.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: I believe in providing opportunity to others who are willing to work hard to achieve an improved life for themselves and their families.  I especially believe in the goals of micro finance providing to those in underdeveloped countries with an opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an executive for a company that makes video projectors and flat screen televisions.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I am a fortunate one.
lenders.occupational_info: I write fiction under the name Kundan Ewan.

lenders.name: Spoon with Fork
lenders.loan_because: In the business of helping people

lenders.name: VIPDIP
lenders.loan_because: We think that people know how to best help themselves, just give them the chance.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an organisation that support youths with chronic illness (mostly diabetes) to carry out their own projects. We also support education of for example diabetes dogs.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: Micro-financing allows the little person a chance to thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I make teeth......

lenders.name: Johanna
lenders.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help others- to help themselves.

lenders.name: Kristoffer
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a brilliant idea! Instead of having money, doing not much good, at the bank I can help people make a living. Fantastic!

lenders.name: jenny
lenders.loan_because: what good is wealth is you don't share it with those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: i make alcoholic beverages for people who seek to drown their troubles in intoxication. i feed and condone a vice, therefore, the need to give is inane.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I run projects involved in information technology for a shipping company.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: It is a gift to be able to assist others to independence!
lenders.occupational_info: Nursing is about caring for others and teaching is about assisting others to learn new and interesting things.

lenders.name: Juliana
lenders.loan_because: KIVA is on the rights path to solving world poverty at a grass roots level. Instead of giving money to corrupt governments who dont pass it onto their people, Kiva loans money directly to the people, who can then create a business to sustain their families and hopefully achieve a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: As a self employed Bookkeeper, I run my own business and help other people by taking care of their accounts/ finances in preparation for the accountant.

lenders.name: Bev
lenders.loan_because: I was inspired by what Kiva is achieving after hearing about it on the Oprah Show. I hope to give more and tell my family and friends about it so they can give as well.

lenders.name: eLiz
lenders.loan_because: I have visited several countries in the developing world and have seen how hard people work to support their families.  This is such a simple and fun way to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Because I am retired, I have time to take care of my grandchildren, visit friends, travel, read and do all the little jobs that are needed around the house.

lenders.name: Roberta
lenders.loan_because: I have $1 to give.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a library. I help patrons, and keep the library clean and tidy. I help patrons find books that they may be interested in reading.

lenders.name: Linda and Ehren Ramos
lenders.loan_because: I sometimes need a loan myself, and I always have someone to ask. It makes me feel good to lend a helping hand to people who don't have anywhere else to turn. I can't offer much, but every little bit helps, right?
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home with my two beautiful kids, Wyatt and Helena. My mom recently had a stroke and lives with us, too. Ehren is a carpenter and a wonderful father!

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the concept of helping others to help themselves.  I cannot sit back and not participate when we in the developed world waste so much while so many in the developing world seek so little for their basic necessities.

lenders.name: Shirley
lenders.loan_because: I started my own business 35 years ago with $600 in start up capital and now have 25 employees and am the largest florist in our area.
lenders.occupational_info: We sell fresh flowers, plants, gifts and balloons to the public and business customers.  We send flowers anywhere in the US and around the world.

lenders.name: Melissa & Dave
lenders.loan_because: though I do not have a lot of money, i know how much just a hand up can give someone.
lenders.occupational_info: She is a military veteran...She wrote stories for the military newspaper and made a nightly tv news program for the other troops.  He is a motorcycle (Harley Davidson) Mechanic.

lenders.name: Jeremy and Heather
lenders.loan_because: It is a great idea and it helps make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: A guy who fixes computers and a nurse that takes care of babies.

lenders.name: Henrik
lenders.loan_because: I have the possibility, it feels good to be able to help and see the progress.
lenders.occupational_info: Finance systems

lenders.name: Ernie
lenders.loan_because: At times in my life when I really needed help, sometimes it came from people that hardly knew me.
lenders.occupational_info: I repair scooters and mopeds.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: loans have helped me!  It's my pleasure to share what I have.
lenders.occupational_info: *I re-gift useful information as humor.* In my  latest book, I teach women how to read a man by his shoes.  It's titled:  Never Trust a Man in Alligator Loafers.

lenders.name: Lila
lenders.loan_because: I believe credit is a fundamental human right and Kiva is an efficient way for my money to directly benefit someone truly in need.

lenders.name: Mary Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I believe the small investments we make in the livelihoods of others will make huge improvements in the lives of many.
lenders.occupational_info:
As a nurse in the post-anesthesia area of a surgical unit, I assist patients as they recover from the effects of anesthesia, help manage any symptoms they may have such as pain or nausea, and prepare them to manage their activities at home following their surgical procedure.
I am committed to caring and advocating for my patients.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: If I can help loved ones or friends, knowing part-none will be repaid why wouldn’t I help someone who’s more willing to help themselves and has a solid work ethic???
lenders.occupational_info: Administration Assistants in my area are not paid well. Per the cost of living I am still "low income" for my area. I know how it is to fight to make enough to eat and care for myself, my home and animals. I choose to live in the country so my home is quiet and peaceful and I am able to rent land. If I was to live in the city I could make much better money doing the same thing. To me, making more money is not worth sacrificing a relaxing home, even if it means almost twice the work to do all on my own!!!

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I love this concept! It stimulates the economy at a grassroots level. If this takes-off it will truly solve many problems. You will notice that most of the businesses are agriculture. That is telling.
lenders.occupational_info: Jiibe.com is my company. We help people make better decisions for a happier life.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: nothing feels better than being able to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I help train and develop new customer service reps to be successful employees.

lenders.name: Penny & Pixie
lenders.loan_because: We are two sisters running a small family business out of our homes and we wanted to help another woman running her own business.
lenders.occupational_info: We have a product line made from recycled sails - we love that our products are eco-friendly.

lenders.name: william
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: academic

lenders.name: Bengt in Sweden
lenders.loan_because: It seems like the natural thing to do!

lenders.name: Ramona
lenders.loan_because: I have received a Kiva gift certificate on my birthday from some very dear friends of mine. I do think we can help others; it makes such a big difference to their lives!

lenders.name: Ahulani
lenders.loan_because: I have such abundance in my life and I have been helped by so many people. I also receive great pleasure in supporting women to be independent and to thrive.
lenders.occupational_info: I help Highly Sensitive People thrive in finding their purpose, being able to feel safe in their environments, lead fulfilling, joyful, loving and prosperous lives.

lenders.name: Mariam
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those that want to help themselves.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.occupation: Therapist in the Child Welfare Field
lenders.loan_because: I believe in global giving.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist families in crisis and help them find ways to stay together and take care of one another.

lenders.name: Guy
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough  to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I do 'something with computers' and am passionate about the power of formal project managment in delivering change.

lenders.name: Sharath
lenders.loan_because:
- Not at all of are credit-worthy to start with and thus benefit from lending instruments offered by for-profit institutions. 

- Kiva's logistics and administrative resources together with the financial support of volunteer lenders can go some distance in compensating for the lottery of birth. 

- Finally, while I would donate and support grants for children, I am more likely to loan to able adults - they make development sustainable at a macro-level and at a microlevel, enable individuals become and remain responsible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the intersection of statistics, advertising, user-experience and language.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I should.  I must.  It sounds cliche, but we ARE the world.  Let's all make it a little better place to be.

lenders.name: james
lenders.loan_because: it's a simple and effective way to improve our world by investing in people.  as an american, i am blessed with numerous opportunities for success, and i want to create those opportunities for others around the world who are every bit as deserving. this is one way i feel called to "love my neighbor as myself".
lenders.occupational_info: i'm a geek.

lenders.name: Giuseppe
lenders.loan_because: we westerners must help people living in poorer areas
lenders.occupational_info: researcher in materials science (energy field); experimental poet / playwright.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I want to help everyone's business dreams come true...everyone deserves a chance!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a buyer/merchandiser of clothes for a large retailer in the United States.

lenders.name: Tolga
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Managing projects that provide telecommunications infrastructure in developing countries

lenders.name: Megan & Jack
lenders.loan_because:
We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give
 -  Winston Churchill

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I'm so thankful for the opportunites that continue to come my way.  I want to do my part to create opportunities for others...

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I love to offer a chance for someone to build a business and succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of small children
